# AggroBorg - High Risk, High Reward Deep Diver
# Generated by: Sonnet 4.5
# Strategy: Maximize speed and damage to blitz through dungeon levels,
# accepting higher death risk for faster progression to endgame content.

# Worships
borg_worships_damage = TRUE
borg_worships_speed = TRUE
borg_worships_hp = FALSE
borg_worships_mana = FALSE
borg_worships_ac = FALSE
borg_worships_gold = FALSE

# Behavior
borg_plays_risky = TRUE
borg_kills_uniques = FALSE
borg_uses_swaps = TRUE
borg_no_deeper = 127
borg_cheat_death = FALSE
